text: Do you remember your first concert?
Do you remember your best friend in elementary school? Do you know where they are now?
Do you remember a nickname as a kid? Did you like it or hate it?
Do you remember learning to ride a bike? Who helped you? Or your first bike crash?
Do you remember whether there was a high school sport or extracurricular activity that you excelled in?
Do you remember your first job?
Do you remember a time you felt really guilty?
Do you remember someone you wish you could give thanks to, and for what?
Do you remember a beloved item from your childhood or teen years that you still own?
Do you remember when you idolized a teenager?
Do you remember the most embarrassing moment in your life?
Do you remember the first “big” purchase you made with your own money? How much did it cost?
Do you remember a moment when you felt totally out of your element?
Do you remember a milestone in your career or life that really changed you?
Do you remember your first cell phone? What make/model was it?
Do you remember your first crush?
Do you remember what posters you hung on your bedroom walls when you were in high school?
Do you remember what you wanted to be when you grew up?
Do you remember the worst date you ever had?
Do you remember the boldest thing you’ve ever done?
Do you remember a time you really messed up at work? Have you ever been fired or quit a job?
Do you remember a food you never thought you’d like that you love now? Or vice versa?
Do you remember a holiday moment that you cherish?
Do you remember a recurring dream you’ve had?
Do you remember the best advice you’ve ever received? And the worst?
Do you remember your favorite books as a child?
Do you remember your prom? Who was your date?
Do you remember a cherished family routine?
Do you remember a favorite inside joke with coworkers, friends, or family?
Do you remember the best birthday ever?
Do you remember being scared by something as a child? What was it? Does it still scare you?
Do you remember one of the best gifts you’ve ever received?
Do you remember a constant argument you had with your parents? Was it about curfew? Dating? Grades?
Do you remember a favorite family pet or a pet you always wanted?
Do you remember your first kiss?
Do you remember the first band or singer you really, really liked?
Do you remember which musical instrument you played or longed to play when you were younger?
Do you remember the last time you were truly surprised?
Do you remember a time when you felt the most proud of your accomplishments?
Do you remember whether you worried about “being popular” as a teen?
Do you remember a time you felt happiest?
Do you remember a favorite snack from childhood?
Do you remember your first broken heart?
Do you remember your favorite teacher? And your least favorite?
Do you remember a movie or TV show you watched obsessively when you were young?
Do you remember the most beautiful place you’ve ever been?
Do you remember the craziest thing that has ever happened to you?
Do you remember if you had a weekly allowance? How much was it? What did you spend it on?
Do you remember a goal you aimed for that you achieved? Was it hard? How long did it take?
Do you remember your most regrettable hairstyle or your most cringe-worthy outfit?
